description: Evolutionary Self-Improvement System - Bootstrap Ralph to improve itself through experimentation

userStories.title: Establish Baseline Metrics
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need baseline metrics so future experiments can demonstrate improvement.
acceptanceCriteria: experiments.json exists with schema: { baseline: {completion_rate, avg_iterations, code_quality_rate}, experiments: [] }
ralph.sh outputs metrics summary at end of run (stories completed, iterations used, pass/fail counts)
Baseline metrics recorded by running ralph on a test PRD
make test passes

userStories.title: Create Experiment Recording Infrastructure
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need structured experiment recording so I can analyze past results.
acceptanceCriteria: docs/experiments/ directory exists
docs/experiments/TEMPLATE.md exists with sections: Hypothesis, Mutation, Results, Learnings, Metrics
CLAUDE.md contains 'Experiment Recording' section with instructions for recording results
make test passes

userStories.title: First Complete Evolutionary Loop
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need to prove the full cycle works: hypothesize, mutate, measure, select, record.
acceptanceCriteria: ralph.sh accepts --experiment flag that enables experiment mode
Experiment mode creates feature branch automatically before mutations
Metrics collected at end and compared to baseline in experiments.json
Results recorded in both experiments.json and docs/experiments/EXP-003.md
make test passes

userStories.title: Automated Hypothesis Generation
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need to generate my own hypotheses based on past experiment data.
acceptanceCriteria: CLAUDE.md contains 'Hypothesis Generation' section with analysis framework
ralph.sh accepts --next-experiment flag that outputs proposed hypothesis
Hypothesis generation reads experiments.json and identifies lowest-performing metric
Proposed hypothesis is structured: metric targeted, expected improvement, specific change
make test passes

userStories.title: Stagnation Detection and Big Mutations
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need escape hatches from local maxima when incremental changes stop improving fitness.
acceptanceCriteria: experiments.json tracks stagnation_count field (increments when experiment shows no improvement)
ralph.sh detects stagnation: 3 consecutive experiments with no fitness improvement
CLAUDE.md contains 'Big Mutation Catalog' with at least 5 major structural change ideas
Stagnation triggers automatic selection from big mutation catalog
make test passes

userStories.title: Self-Directing Evolution
userStories.description: As an evolutionary system, I need to run multiple experiment generations autonomously.
acceptanceCriteria: ralph.sh accepts --generations N flag to run N experiment cycles
Each generation: proposes hypothesis, runs experiment, records results, proposes next
Safety limits: stops after 3 consecutive experiment failures
Generates summary report at docs/experiments/generation-summary.md after completing
make test passes
